title: Blood
description: With his twin brother J.J. freed from captivity, Seth Michael Sullivan delves deeper into the mystery of the Black Swan, the werekin prophesied to raise Lemuria from the depths, returning the werkein to their homeland. Increasingly embroiled in the human-versus-alien politics at Fairfax High, including a basketball rivalry and the dilemma of prom, Seth finds his love affair with Marshall Townsend tested to the limit. When Chimera Enterprises targets Marshall to find the Black Swan, the fragile human-werekin alliance is threatened by a spy amongst the werekin Commanders, who may be J.J.!
author: Jesse Daro
